thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: An ETF Rides the Wave of Emerging Markets and the Internet

author: Gerrard Cowan
title: An ETF Rides the Wave of Emerging Markets and the Internet
text:
Emerging markets and the internet both get investors’ hearts racing, and one ETF that combines the two is cashing in.
The $513 million Emerging Markets Internet & Ecommerce ETF (EMQQ) rose 52.8% for the one-year period ended Feb. 28, and 6.4% since the start of the year, by focusing on “the fastest-growing part of the fastest-growing markets,” say its founder Kevin Carter. “Billions of people are entering the consumer class…and are leapfrogging traditional consumption by getting computers in their pockets,” he says, referring...
